Package sootup.java.sourcecode.frontend

Class WalaIRToJimpleConverter

java.lang.Object
sootup.java.sourcecode.frontend.WalaIRToJimpleConverter
public class WalaIRToJimpleConverter extends Object
Converter which converts WALA IR to jimple.
Author:
Linghui Luo
